metadata.title: CVE-2024-9693 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 16.0 prior to 17.3.7, starting from 17.4 prior to 17.4.4, and startingfrom 17.5 prior to 17.5.2, which could have allowed unauthorized access tothe Kubernetes agent in a cluster under specific configurations.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
